entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Instrumented clrjit causes random msbuild failures #67627
  • Rolling build failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.DefaultsToOffOutsideOfService #67625
  • Consider using RegexCasingEquivalence table for case insensitive matches when the pattern contains backreferences #67624
    7.0.0
  • Making numerical formatting specifiers more consistent #67623
  • XmlSerializer Breaks When An Empty Element is in the XML Stream. #67622
  • [API Proposal]: Allow keys with colons in config #67616
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests_MsQuicProvider.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws failed with OperationCanceledException #67612
  • [iOS] OptionsMonitorTest.TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached Test Fails #67611
    Future
  • ReadOnlySequence.Slice(int start, int length) has (perhaps) unexpected behavior #67607
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #67605
    6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #67603
    6.0.x
  • Rolling build test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_MultipleFilters with message "Created event did not occur as expected" #67601
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF) || addr->IsIntegralConst(0)' #67600
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggerExtensions.LogError does not log provided exception. #67597
  • Starting a process on M1(ARM) CPU is 10 times slower than on Intel CPU #67591
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer does not work with Dictionary<string, object> #67588
    7.0.0
  • Bad Process.StartTime in .NET 6 on Android #67583
  • Aplication not found WindowsDesktop. @area-Host #67580
  • Regressions in System.ConsoleTests.Perf_Console and Perf_BitOperations #67598
  • Regressions in SequenceEqual #67596
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #67595
  • Regressions due to QJFL and OSR #67594
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #67592
  • FormattedLogValues struct should be public #67577
  • System.Reflection.Tests.AssemblyTests.GetSatelliteAssemblyNeg fails #67569
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Tests.TypeInfoTests.IsAssignableNullable fails #67568
    Future
  • Improve allocations in `ConfigurationBinder` #67566
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecurse/tailrecurse.sh #67215
    7.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Generic math IntPtr SByte and Int16 test failures #61920
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/NaN/intrinsic_nonf_il_r/intrinsic_nonf_il_r.sh #66424
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Devirtualization/structreturningstruct/structreturningstruct.sh #66924
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect JsonException.Path when using non-leaf custom JsonConverters #67403
  • JIT: Writes to small args on macOS can (still) overwrite adjacent args #67331
  • [QUIC] SendResettableCompletionSource set exception in AbortWrite #59347
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CopyTo<String> #61213
    7.0.0
  • Bug in Task Completions on MacOS and Linux #67567
  • Building src/native results in "ignoring unknown option: --minimize" #66770

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #67621
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #67610
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources #67608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for installing latest sdk for workload testing #67606
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable test Runtime_56953 #67604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Pin Roslyn version for generators in .NET 7 ref pack #67599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • log entire content to see which assertion fails #67586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement
  • Re-enable a few Regex source generator tests #67585
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use ComSmartPtr in tests #67584
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep array MT alive while getting component size #67578
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Change Regex UnicodeCategoryRanges to use spans #67576
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Allow running System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #67575
    area-System.Reflection
  • Block implementation details on System.Object #67574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to do typeof of function pointers #67573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve reflection rooting generic methods #67572
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some minor reflection bugs #67571
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix generation of type forwarders #67570
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.17 #67614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Disable OptionsMonitorTest.TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached #67613
    area-Extensions-Options
  • [tests] Re-enable generic math Create tests on iOS #67542
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Move tests that touch the network to outerloop only for infra-stability reasons #67593
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable deleting call counting stubs #67563
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform" #67590
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update error message for runtime not found #67564
    area-Host
  • Fix too wide constant stores to parameters on macOS #67336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #67543
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't force `TieredCompilation=0` for SuperPMI replay job #67489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.Tests` for #67550
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-clean-ci

Updated

  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Project file hygiene #67532
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67496
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #67462
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67534
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 6.0.5
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Skip building crossgen when running in source build #67521
    source-build, area-Setup
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    api-approved, area-Meta
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Recursive validation for Options #67548
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Added support of atomic writes for custom value types #65635
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't detect link on path #67525
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Architecture-specific folders like `runtimes/<rid>/native/` outside of NuGet packages [nativeinterop] #24708

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 6.0.203 #24714

  • Update branding to 6.0.105 #24713

  • Update branding to 5.0.408 #24712

  • Update branding to 5.0.214 #24711

  • Update branding to 3.1.419 #24710
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix broken blog post link #24707

Merged

  • Restrict default file inclusion of Windows App SDK files to only happen if specific properties are set #24704

Updated

  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Test winrtcomponents #19635
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1699667 #24673

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source generators cannot access arbitrary item metadata #60595
  • IDE0005 reports Deconstruct method's namespace as not necessary #60594
  • Add support for more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #60593
  • Code style option to prefer default expression over struct default parameterless constructor #60592
  • Proposal: Remove unneeded code-style options, or not include more of them #60584
  • Completion offered for WinForms type that is not actually available #60583
  • UTF8 string IDE follow up items #60582
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in VisualBasicFormatter. #60581
  • Test plan for "numeric IntPtr" #60578
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • Some source generators stopped working with 6.0.200 SDK (file not found) #60532
  • CompleteStatementCommandHandler should work with yield return #54709
    Backlog
  • JsonSerializable Attribute Causing CS1591 Error #60533

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix showing of generators/diagnostics under CPS analyzer nodes #60596
    Area-Analyzers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1701033 #60591
    auto-merge
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Convert Visual Basic error list tests to the new framework #60588
    Area-IDE
  • Instrument ReferenceCachingCS for flakiness #60585
    Area-Compilers
  • Track "numeric IntPtr" feature #60579
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Check val escape for struct field initializers #60577
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure current OOP calls for the same solution-checksum can share the same OOP solution computation #60575
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move few `CodeFixProvider`s to Analyzers layer #60524
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [LSP] Modify semanticTokens `isFinalized` logic #60484
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • Update status for UTF8 literals and checked operators #60587
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1693428 #60495
    auto-merge
  • Fix the Compiler VSIX extension so it works with CPS projects again #60580
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Make NotificationOption2 a serializable struct #60573
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove some 'MyCodeAction's #60557
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support built-in unsigned right shift operators. #60560
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Colorize `async` as keyword in some cases #60558
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete unused files in CodeStyle layer #60548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server MainLayout not always disposed with long polling #41056
  • Blazor project template - lower left nav can be inaccessible in short browser window #41050
  • Blazor wasm: Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime, when calling odata in OnInitializedAsync #41046
  • Tag a new version of the SignalR C++ client project, push out to vcpkg #41045
  • PassThroughAuthorizationHandler does not respect AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure #41043
  • HTTP/3: Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41042

Closed

  • Quarantine StartupTimeoutIsApplied #40036
    Test failures
  • ExcludedRoles parameter in Authorize and AuthorizeView #41012
  • An exception "SqlException: Cannot open database "aspnet-xxxx" requested by the login." thrown when register a new user for the 7.0 web InAuth project. #40994
  • Adding MessagePack causes TypeLoadException #40876
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" #41023
  • [Blazor WASM] <details> @ontoggle goes into loop on page reload(Ctrl+R) #41004
  • Renderer flags components as disposed even though they are not (for IAsyncDisposable) in Blazor #41017
  • Published app can't be accesed #41020

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Uninstalling Hosting Bundle should uninstall chained runtimes #41057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Update branding to 2.1.34 #41055
    2.1.x
  • Remove BuildX64 target #41040
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.17 #41048
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.17
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #41000
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40807
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40967
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Unquarantine test #40888
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [6.0] Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40859
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Get richnav.yml building again #40783
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Update branding to 6.0.5 #41049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • Move FabricBot to Preview4 #41044
    7.0-preview4
  • Mark DataProtection.Azure* as non-shipping #41007
    area-dataprotection, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40998
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • Update branding to 3.1.25 #41047
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • Fix DatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter to handle wrapped DbExceptions #41041
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4.22204.1 #41038
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-mvc, ask-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio stacks elide some CLR frames in mixed mode #2982

Closed

  • [Documentation] Document known caveats to diagnostic tools #1737
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Mark dbgshim as not shipping #2980

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [foldable] `SpanMode` not updated when app spanned/unspanned #5852
  • [foldable] `OnResume` incorrectly calculates fold position, breaks TwoPaneLayout #5851
  • Repeatedly going to "/" in MAUI app on Android shows an info/error in the logs #5850
  • CapturePhotoAsync returns null (Windows) #5849
  • App Crash From Multiple Theme Switches #5848
  • SDK Target Platforms .targets/.props files not loading on MAUI Project #5847
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Verify Blazor Hybrid on Android doesn't log exceptions by default #5837
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • ControlTemplate ignored on ContentPage #5836
  • [Spec] Separate Text Wrapping and Overflow in Core #5835
  • Multi-targeting frameworks in Maui does not work #5833
    6.0.300
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer doesn't fire #5825
  • Name of recipe is working as a button but Voiceover doesn’t announce its role. #5823
    6.0.300
  • Voiceover is not reading the label name when focus move to text field. #5822
    6.0.300
  • Voiceover is unnecessarily announcing as a heading at "Click here to View full recipe" link and "Add to My Recipes" button. #5821
  • Border rendered incorrectly and shadow not working on Android #5820
  • Name of recipe is not visible in landscape mode. #5819
  • Voiceover reading switch button for radio button. #5818
  • Voiceover reading button for "Click here to View full recipe" link. #5816
  • Voiceover focus is going to some hidden content after "Keto" in search by diet section. #5815
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Name of recipe is being announced by Voiceover but its not visible for visual users. #5814

Closed

  • [Bug] Maui Blazor InputFile #2678
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Hooking to macOS Application Lifecycle events #5840
  • Hot reload not working after background color change of a control #5743
  • DisplayAlert Cancel disables ToolbarItems #5723
  • Make DualScreen controls work in MAUI #1752
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Button visual state not resetting to normal on Windows #5824
  • [Bug] Ain't no shadow like a Windows shadow #3082
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Maui Blazor, static files from Razor Class Library not included in wwwroot #4758
    6.0.300
  • Add BlazorWebView breaking changes to preview 14 readme #5200
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Packaged WPF Blazor WebView app crashes when looking for wwwroot in system32 #3866
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] The Entry.MaxLength value is inconsistent #678
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Default Storage Permission for Android SingleProject #5853
  • Add Essentials Maps TryOpen #5834
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • VersionTracking correctly handle version downgrades (e.g. via TestFlight) #5829
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Add a vscode workspace and some build tasks #5827
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fixing image shadows on Windows #5763
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Remove NETSTANDARD1 defines #5809
    area/architecture
  • Revert Maestro bumps for now #5838
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updating TargetFrameworks condition value #5813
  • Allow restricted permissions for Geolocation on Android #5830
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Remove trivial calls to GetTypeInfo #5807
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [ci] Add CoherentParentDependency="Microsoft.Maui.Graphics" #5806
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Surface exception for not supported phone number on iOS PhoneDialer #5800
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Bug] [AppAction] [Android] Prevent AppAction double handling on Android #5793
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Use fallbacks for font sizes when getting font from Span on Android #5680
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Remove unused cssFallbackTypeName on Element #5805
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2

Updated

  • Add MAUI and WPF Blazor Hybrid XAML namespaces #5720
    area/Xaml </>, area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Run all navigation through async update #5744
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Controls] remove allow-listed Converters #5670
  • Fix Android Radio Button #5773
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Blazor] Initial support on for configuring WebView2 settings #5802
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912

  • Add pending changes in Alerts (RTL, Keyboard) #5739
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use collation to set a case insensitive provider value comparer #27762
  • Make ModificationCommandComparer compare provider values #27761
  • Inserting Integer Key WIth Default Value #27760
  • What is the difference between ValueConverter or OwnedType for simple value objects? #27758
  • Add a generic IUpdateEntry.GetCurrentProviderValue and ColumnValuePropagator to avoid boxing #27756
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Groub by not working at all #27717
  • Should you be able to avoid circular dependency error if all ID's are manually assigned? #27714
  • Hybrid TPT and TPH #27707
  • .Contains method generate different commands if it take its value from variable or directly #27700
  • errors while migrationg drive to m365 #27757

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27771
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27770
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27769
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Support value generation for converted types #27759
    providers-beware

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.5 #27765
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Update Grpc.AspNetCore dependency #27726
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to collection result expression (part 2) #27664
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.5
  • Update branding to 5.0.17 #27764
    tell-mode, 5.0.17
  • Update branding to 3.1.25 #27763
    tell-mode, 3.1.25
  • Add TPC support to update pipeline #27737
